website_summaries.verdict: Classic flavor with a colorful twist that kids and parents appreciate.
pros: Kids love the fun colors of red, green, red-orange, and orange
Parents love that all the colors are derived from natural sources like annatto, watermelon, turmeric, and beet juice
Even though they are different colors, the crackers maintain the classic cheddar flavor
cons: Very large order that might not work for everyone
The cartons fold closed but do not seal

customer_reviews.title: The snack that smiles back keeps me smiling!
customer_reviews.text: What can i say? They’re goldfish. They’re delicious. I bought a ton of them because my kids ate them all and I wouldn’t get more than a handful and then I’d sulk and crave goldfish. So a few giant containers did the trick. Would do it all over again haha. Would def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Kane

customer_reviews.title: Yummy salty snack
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes the rainbow ones. The colors are natural and made from things normally found in food, so no Red 40 or anything nasty like that. It's a salty, high-carb snack, but better than some.
customer_reviews.author: Besa

customer_reviews.title: Subscribe and Save with lots of shelf life (several months)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as part of Amazon's "Subscribe and save" these have a sell by date of several months which is perfect. Awesomely packaged, and taste great, and the best price !! These will keep me subscribing, especially the speed my brood gets through them !
customer_reviews.author: C. Foley

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love fish (and so does my wife). They are always great and the little ones like to practice their colors with them.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Wrong order
customer_reviews.text: This order is for a case of 6 boxes of Goldfish Crackers, and we were only sent 1 box. It is Subscribe and Save and every other month there has been no mistake.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Great in soups
customer_reviews.text: Can last for days on these Well assuming i dont want to cook.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Expired
customer_reviews.text: I never checked the expiration date until today when I opened one and it smelled terribly old. The order was placed in August, 2018, but when I checked the expiration date today its 04/29/2018, which means they were expired for four month already before shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outdated/Expired product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 18 30 oz boxes of Goldfish Colors crackers for a PRESCHOOL snack activity for 400 students to celebrate Dr. Seuss's book "One Fish Two Fish Red Fish Blue Fish" & the boxes were OUTDATED! As in EXPIRED! They smelled horrible & were unable to be used! I let my entire school down!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 kids. These have natural food coloring in them. This is a huge case of fishies. We love these. Just ordered a second case.
customer_reviews.author: uhtred6

customer_reviews.title: Taste the Rainbow!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal on Goldfish delivered all the way to Kuwait! If you are in a remote location like me this is a super deal.
customer_reviews.author: Animated Puppets

customer_reviews.title: My kid and I love to have these for a snack
customer_reviews.text: My kid and I love to have these for a snack. He prefers the colored goldfish crackers and I love the option to buy in bulk six 30oz boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the original
customer_reviews.text: These are 'okay' fishy crackers but not quite as tasty as the original cheese flavor. I think the natural vegetable coloring gives these a bit of an off flavor but not so bad that they aren't still edible. Personally, I wouldn't go out of my way to ever buy these again though.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cheffy ⭐💖🌛Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Delicious as always
customer_reviews.text: These are always great! I send some cartons to my son’s school and we use them at home all the time! Way better than those little bags of goldfish. Somehow the colors ones taste saltier than regular and we like that. I recommend them and I will be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C

customer_reviews.title: Great, Great
customer_reviews.text: P these came fresh and they came in good condition. The price was great and they're awesome for parties. The expiration date was plenty far out and the crackers Taste of fresh
customer_reviews.author: Boymama

customer_reviews.title: My kids can't get enough of these. We use ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids can't get enough of these. We use them as an after swimming snack, to encourage them to get out of the pool when we are worn out ;)
customer_reviews.author: Candace P

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: goldfish, always a must for kids. More than that, it is a rainbow!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

product_meta.title: Pepperidge Farm Goldfish Crackers Colors Cheddar, 30 oz. Carton
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Colors| Size:30 Ounce (Pack of 6)With Goldfish crackers, the smiles come naturally. Baked with 100% real cheddar cheese, plus no artificial flavors or preservatives, Goldfish Colors are a snack the whole family will adore. All colors are sourced from plants. The red Goldfish crackers are colored using a mix of beet juice concentrate and paprika extracted from sweet red peppers. Green comes from watermelon and huito juice concentrates mixed with extracted turmeric. The red-orange Goldfish are colored with paprika extracted from sweet red peppers, and finally, the orange Goldfish use annatto extracted from the seed of the achiote tree. With a large 30 oz. carton you can always come back for more, or have enough to feed a crowd. For Pepperidge Farm, baking is more than a job. It's a real passion. Each day, the Pepperidge Farm bakers take the time to make every cookie, pastry, cracker and loaf of bread the best way they know how by using carefully selected, quality ingredients.
feature_bullets: COLORFUL CHEESY GOLDFISH: Playful cheese crackers in a rainbow of colors, baked with a smile
BAKED WITH REAL CHEESE: Always made with 100% real cheddar cheese and no artificial flavors or preservatives
COLORS SOURCED FROM PLANTS: Pepperidge Farm uses colors sourced from plants — like red beet juice concentrate — to make Goldfish Colors colorful
THE SNACK THAT SMILES BACK: Goldfish crackers have been making families smile for decades
STOCK UP ON GOLDFISH CRACKERS: Large 30-oz. carton with easy-pour spout is the perfect size to portion out snacks for lunchboxes, gatherings and on-the-go treats

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
